description: Enable Large Language Models like Claude, GPT, and Gemini to interact with your Nextcloud data through a secure API. Create notes, manage calendars, organize contacts, work with files, and more - all through natural language conversations.

app_password.description: Nextcloud app password. Generate at Settings > Security > App passwords. Do NOT use your main password.

nextcloud_url.description: Your Nextcloud instance URL (e.g., https://cloud.example.com). Must be publicly accessible.
